title: Defence of Milak = Memories of Milak

abstract: Milak village, in Northern New Guinea was one of the war actions I was involved in and one I will never forget
description: Keith Johnston was a member of Btroop 2/10th commando squadron and served in Northern New Guinea during World War II. During the battle in Milak village, he was stuck in a pit with two others for over five days.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001753; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [June 2009]; Active; 2009
